snippet: The Justice Department will not block Expedia’s $1.3 billion purchase of Orbitz, another travel-booking site.
abstract: Justice Department will not attempt to stop acquisition of travel-booking site Orbitz by bigger rival Expedia, clearing path for completion of $1.3 billion merger.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department will not block Expedia’s $1.3 billion purchase of Orbitz, another travel-booking site.

headline.main: Antitrust Nod for Expedia to Buy Orbitz
headline.print_headline: Antitrust Nod for Expedia to Buy Orbitz
